name: weather_report
description: Generate a comprehensive weather report with current conditions and recommendations

arguments.name: location
arguments.description: City or location name for the weather report

arguments.name: weather_data
arguments.description: Raw weather data from the weather tool

arguments.name: temperature_analysis
arguments.description: Analysis of temperature conditions and feels-like assessment

arguments.name: weather_summary
arguments.description: Summary of current weather conditions and what they mean

arguments.name: atmospheric_conditions
arguments.description: Analysis of humidity, pressure, and wind conditions

arguments.name: clothing_advice
arguments.description: Specific clothing recommendations based on temperature and conditions

arguments.name: activity_suggestions
arguments.description: Recommended activities suitable for current weather

arguments.name: comfort_rating
arguments.description: Overall comfort assessment and rating for the weather

arguments.name: timestamp
arguments.description: When the weather report was generated
